wheels.notes: Standard passenger vehicles must have 4 to 6 wheels

steering.notes: Steering system must be responsive and approved type

oil.notes: Oil capacity should meet engine requirements

headlights.notes: Must have at least two working front-facing headlights

seatbelts.notes: Each passenger seat must be equipped with a seatbelt

airbags.notes: Driver and front passenger airbags are mandatory

emission.notes: Vehicle must comply with Bharat Stage 6 (BS6) emission norms

mirrors.notes: Minimum two mirrors required: one rear-view and one side-view
